question: 1. I want this to be done ___
options: precisely, carefully and as soon as possible.
with accurate measure, carefully, immediately
precisely, carefully and immediately
precisely, with proper precaution and immediately.
explanation: Explanation:  The selected option is the only viable one out of the given ones as all the words are in adverb form.

question: 2. His actions were –
options: bold, with lots of courage and laudable.
bold, courageous and laudable.
bold, with lots of courage and can be praised.
bold, courageous and can be praised.
explanation: Explanation:  The selected option is the only viable one out of the given ones as all the words are in noun form.

question: 3. She was –
options: weak, vulnerable and stupid.
not so strong, without any defense and stupid.
weak, without any defense and stupid.
weak, vulnerable and lacked intelligence.
explanation: Explanation:  Option 3 is the only viable one out of the given ones as all the words are in noun form here.

question: 4. Doctor advised him –
options: to stay at home, taking proper medication and avoiding junk food.
staying at home, to take proper medication and to avoid junk food.
to stay at home, to take proper medication and avoiding junk food.
to stay at home, to take proper medication and to avoid junk food.
result: to stay at home, to take proper medication and to avoid junk food.

question: 5. My wife is ___
options: an artist, sings and dances.
an artist, a singer and dances.
an artist, a singer and a dancer.
an artist. Sings and a dancer.
result: an artist, a singer and a dancer.

question: 6. I asked him to finish reading the book ___
options: as soon as possible and thoroughly.
quickly and thoroughly.
quickly and in a detailed manner.
soon as possible and to be as precise at it can be.

question: 7. The protest was –
options: peaceful, organized and goal oriented.
not violent, without any chaos and goal oriented.
peaceful, without any chaos and goal oriented.
not violent, organized and not scattered.

question: 8. I know you can complete the task –
options: not requiring any help, within time and avoiding errors.
not requiring any help, timely and accurately.
alone, within time and avoiding errors.
alone, timely and accurately.

question: 9. Don’t leave me here –
options: alone, helpless and blindfolded.
alone, without any assistance and eyes tied up.
alone, helpless and eyes tied up.
alone, without any assistance and blindfolded.

question: 10. While visiting New York we –
options: roamed around, eating at restaurants and enjoyed our stay there.
roaming around, ate at restaurants and enjoyed our stay there.
roamed around, ate at restaurants and enjoying our stay there.
roamed around, ate at restaurants and enjoyed our stay there.
result: roamed around, ate at restaurants and enjoyed our stay there.

question: 11. She likes –
options: reading, writing and to recite.
to read, to write and reciting.
to read, to write and to recite.
to read, writing and reciting.
result: to read, to write and to recite.

question: 12. After finishing my dinner I usually like to ____
options: watching movies, playing video games and drink coffee.
watch movies, play video games and drink coffee.
watch movies, playing video games and drink coffee.
watching movies, play video games and drinking coffee.
result: watch movies, play video games and drink coffee.

question: 13. The story is –
options: thrilling, romantic and factious.
a thriller, romantic and factious.
thriller, romantic and a fiction.
thriller, romantic and a fiction.

question: 14. This girl is –
options: beautiful, have lots of talent and will definitely grow into an adorable woman.
a thing of beauty, intelligent and is going to be grown into an adorable woman.
beautiful, intelligent and will definitely grow into an adorable woman.
a thing of beauty, have lots of talent and is going to be grown into an adorable  woman.
result: beautiful, intelligent and will definitely grow into an adorable woman.

question: 15. What he submitted was –
options: nonsense, without any proper meaning and didn’t have any organization.
nonsense, meaningless and unorganized.
had no sense, meaningless and wasn’t properly organized.
nonsense, had no meaning and unorganized.

question: 16. While writing for an exam you should be more –
options: precise, carefully and punctually.
precise, careful and punctually.
precisely, carefully, and punctual.
precise, careful and punctual.

question: 17. During winter it feels –
options: cold, with a chill and not so comfortable.
cold, chilly and uncomfortable.
not so warm, chilly and uncomfortable.
not so warm, chilly and not so comfortable.

question: 18. After losing the game the manager blamed players’ lack of –
options: concentration, proper attitude and motivation.
concentrating, proper attitude and motivation.
concentration, proper attitude and not being motivated.
concentrating, proper attitude and not being motivated.

question: 19. She told me –
options: to be more responsible, spending more times with her and being more affectionate.
being responsible, to spend more times with her and to be more affectionate.
to be responsible, to spend more times with her and being more affectionate.
to be responsible, to spend more times with her and to be more affectionate.
result: to be responsible, to spend more times with her and to be more affectionate.

question: 20. Money can’t help you to buy –
options: happiness, being peaceful and a perfect family.
being happy, peace and a perfect family.
happiness, peace and a perfect family.
being happy, being peaceful and a perfect family.
result: happiness, peace and a perfect family.
